thread.title: RG
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by RG

author: RG
title: RG
text:
I have filed my income tax returns with R&G Brenner for more than a decade, and every year have been absolutely satisfied with their service.
Highly professional, friendly, client-focused, flexible with scheduling (appointments offered throughout the weekend), and they handle even more complex or difficult tax filings with ease. I consider them top notch in their industry.
